item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

0x200 looks like a hex code. Try adding this somwhere. c.startAnimation(65535); so it doesn’t do that animation.

It didn’t work, I still do a weird emote.

item.title: [PI] Auras
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I recently added an aura base, not this one: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,544290.0.html

I only have the auras with wings at the moment, like Salvation. The problem is that the wings don’t show up unless I put something like this:

if (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerShield]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); }
In Player.java, but for variable that I set auras to. But when I do, my character does a weird emote and and the name is messed up. Could anyone tell me what else I can do? This is the code that I use for auras:

if (playerEquipment[playerAura] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerAura]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); }
Would it have something to do with the 0x200?

Read full topic
